item.title: Messenger (Level 4)
item.description: Applied a patch using git am.

item.title: Apprentice Archivist (Level 2)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Apprentice Web Designer (Level 2)
item.description: Instantly browse your working repository in gitweb with git instaweb

item.title: Apprentice Web Designer (Level 1)
item.description: Instantly browse your working repository in gitweb with git instaweb

item.title: Presenter (Level 4)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Master Author (Level 7)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Traveler (Level 5)
item.description: Streamed changes between another rcs with git svn or git p4.

item.title: Apprentice Seamstress (Level 2)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Cherry Picker
item.description: Used git cherry-pick to add a sha from another branch into the current branch.

item.title: Banker (Level 4)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.title: Weaver
item.description: Investigate old branches by using git reflog

item.title: Apprentice Cleaning lady (Level 3)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 7)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Apprentice Merchant (Level 2)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Architect (Level 4)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Traveler (Level 4)
item.description: Streamed changes between another rcs with git svn or git p4.

item.title: Apprentice Presenter (Level 3)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Author (Level 6)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Product Manager (Level 4)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Apprentice Banker (Level 3)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.
